channel.title: Max lvls-max stats-max hit?
channel.description: Hi guys how do u change the Cmbt lvls in ur server..and when i go too change my stats too 135 they dont work..can some 1 help

item.title: Max lvls-max stats-max hit?
item.dc:creator: @dumb_ass dumb ass
item.description:
@dumb_ass wrote:

Hi guys i was wondering atm the max stats on my server are 99, how do i change that and how do i change the cmbt and max hits?
And the hp on NPC’s

for changing max stats search this

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

a bit underneithe you’ll see this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99;

just change the 99 to what you want

Note: it might not work above 135 dint for me.

To Change npc’s hp lvl go into your npc.cfg file and search for npc’s hp you wanna change and then change the last digits not the first ones thats the combat lvl second digits are the hp of the npc.

that should of helped you.

Read full topic
